languages.text: {n}Голос Маражая падает до урчащего шепота.{/n} "Ты хотел{mf||а} познать мой мир, {name}. Где же изъявленное тобой желание теперь?"
{n}Marazhai's voice drops to a whispered growl.{/n} "You wanted to know my world, {name}. Where is that desire now?"
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Маражая падает до урчащего шепота.{/n} "Ты хотел{mf||а} познать мой мир, {name}. Где же изъявленное тобой желание теперь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a whispered growl.{/n} "You wanted to know my world, {name}. Where is that desire now?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋压低了声音，如同低吼一般。{/n}“你打算了解我的世界，{name}。可现在，你的愿望去哪了？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a whispered growl.{/n} "You wanted to know my world, {name}. Where is that desire now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋压低了声音，如同低吼一般。{/n}“你打算了解我的世界，{name}。可现在，你的愿望去哪了？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの声は抑えられ、囁くような唸り声になる。{/n}「俺の世界を知りたいと言ったな、{name}。その気持ちはどこへ行った？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a whispered growl.{/n} "You wanted to know my world, {name}. Where is that desire now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの声は抑えられ、囁くような唸り声になる。{/n}「俺の世界を知りたいと言ったな、{name}。その気持ちはどこへ行った？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai baja la voz hasta hablar con un ronco susurro.{/n} «Tú querías conocer mi mundo, {name}. ¿Dónde ha quedado ese deseo?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a whispered growl.{/n} "You wanted to know my world, {name}. Where is that desire now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai baja la voz hasta hablar con un ronco susurro.{/n} «Tú querías conocer mi mundo, {name}. ¿Dónde ha quedado ese deseo?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voix de Marazhai se réduit à un grondement sourd.{/n} « C'est vous qui avez insisté pour découvrir mon monde, {name}. Où est passée votre soif de connaissance ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a whispered growl.{/n} "You wanted to know my world, {name}. Where is that desire now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Marazhai se réduit à un grondement sourd.{/n} « C'est vous qui avez insisté pour découvrir mon monde, {name}. Où est passée votre soif de connaissance ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Stimme wird zu einem knurrenden Flüstern.{/n} "Ihr wolltet meine Welt kennenlernen, {name}. Was ist aus diesem Verlangen geworden?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a whispered growl.{/n} "You wanted to know my world, {name}. Where is that desire now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Stimme wird zu einem knurrenden Flüstern.{/n} "Ihr wolltet meine Welt kennenlernen, {name}. Was ist aus diesem Verlangen geworden?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın sesi, fısıltılı bir homurtuya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Dünyamı tanımak istemiştin {name}. O arzu nereye kayboldu?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a whispered growl.{/n} "You wanted to know my world, {name}. Where is that desire now?"
